snippet: North Carolina is investigating how what appears to be a transcript for former football star Julius Peppers surfaced on the university’s website.
abstract: North Carolina is investigating how what appears to be a transcript for former football star Julius Peppers surfaced on the university’s Web site.
lead_paragraph: North Carolina is investigating how what appears to be a transcript for former football star Julius Peppers surfaced on the university’s website.

headline.main: Transcript for Peppers Is Posted Online
headline.print_headline: Transcript for Peppers Is Posted Online
